channel.title: How to piss your friends off
channel.description: How to piss your friends off. I have made an application that pretends to be an nVIDIA driver, when all it does is logs you off the pc, and makes you think you have a virus. Send it to your friends over msn. The file is attached.... Run it if you want.... But it's kinda boring if you know what it does.

item.title: How to piss your friends off
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I know you didn’t intentionally post it here however, this can be malicious, resulting in hours of lost work, or more.

Read full topic
item.source: How to piss your friends off
